text: The Santa Monica Mountains are blurred by an impenetrable fog when I arrive for a hike along Mulholland Drive in Los Angeles. It ’ s 6 : 05 a. m., and Kerry Washington rolls down the window of her Audi compact SUV. “ I ’ m soooo sorry. It apparently doesn't open until 6 : 30 a. m., ” she says, “ but we can chat in the car. Come in! ” Thomas Whiteside All I can think is, The woman has bested nature, as I slip into the passenger seat. My feet share space with a soccer ball, and she laughs. “ I ’ m literally a soccer mom, ” she says, noting that her husband, former NFL cornerback and actor - producer Nnamdi Asomugha, bought the
